In England, in the seven days to 13 April, there were 15,701 new confirmed cases (27.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 April, there were 16,782 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 6% (1,081 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 April is 3,834,283 (6,812 cases per 100,000 population).
